welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Massapequa, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, charming Main Street, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Republic Field Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to many major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights and is known for its modern design and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
